channel.title: koRpus.lang.nl
channel.description: Adds support for the Dutch language to the 'koRpus' package. Due to some restrictions on CRAN, the full package sources are only available from the project homepage. To ask for help, report bugs, suggest feature improvements, or discuss the global development of the package, please subscribe to the koRpus-dev mailing list (<http://korpusml.reaktanz.de>).

item.title: Changes in koRpus.lang.nl version 0.01-4
item.description:
changed

  • adjusted koRpus dependency to >= 0.11-1

  • package was moved to the l10n repository on github

removed

  • hyphenation patterns: are now imported via the sylly.pt package

item.title: Changes in koRpus.lang.nl version 0.01-3
item.description:
changed

  • renamed preset from "nl-utf8" into plain "nl" , as UTF-8 is the default in both TreeTagger and koRpus

added

  • README.md file

item.title: Changes in koRpus.lang.nl version 0.01-2
item.description:
fixed

  • adjusted koRpus dependency to >= 0.06-3

  • typo in package description

item.title: Changes in koRpus.lang.nl version 0.01-1
item.description:
changed

  • initial public release via reaktanz.de
